title: [Large-Scale] Web-Based Learning Quality Assurance Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with web-based learning tools and foundational digital literacy
context.additional_context: Focused on designing a web-based learning content quality management system applicable to real work environments for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain five quality evaluation metrics for web-based learning systems.
Learners can utilize three web tools to measure learner engagement in a PBL environment.
Learners can propose improvements to learning content based on real-world project scenarios, meeting over 80% quality standards.
Learners can establish a three-step procedure to ensure learning data security in a BYOD environment.
Learners can analyze learner satisfaction survey results and develop a quality improvement action plan with over 70% implementation feasibility.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
